name: subteam_created
desc: A User Group has been added to the workspace.
long_desc: A User Group has been added to the workspace. The subteam_created event is sent to all connections for a workspace when a new User Group is created. Clients can use this to update their local list of User Groups and group members.

subteam.name: Marketing Team
subteam.description: Marketing gurus, PR experts and product advocates.
